text.textblock: Take notice that an informal settlement conference in the above-captioned proceeding will be held on Wednesday, February 23, 1994, at 10 a.m. in a room to be designated at the offices of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, 825 North Capitol Street, NE., Washington, DC 20426.
Attendance will be limited to the parties and staff. For additional information, please contact Mark Hegerle at (202) 208-0927.

doctitle.textblock: Montana Power Co.; Informal Settlement Conference
